SEARCH
Module com.psymk6
Package com.psymk6.models

Class BlockadeModel

java.lang.Object
com.psymk6.abstracts.CanvasObjectModel
com.psymk6.models.BlockadeModel
public class BlockadeModel extends CanvasObjectModel
The BlockadeModel class represents the model for the blockades in the SnakeGame. It manages the blockades' images, positions, and other related attributes.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mateusz Klocek
